channel.title: The Inglorious Fate [614] - Recruiting!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/6076/devteamlogo.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][u][b][size=14pt]Welcome to the Development Team Recruitment page for The Inglorious Fate![/size][/b][/u] [br] [center][img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/4747/approvalsmall.jpg[/img][/center]
~Info~ Game Name: [b]The Inglorious Fate[/b] Web Site: [b]http://ingloriousfate.99k.org/[/b] Cache Revision: [b]614[/b] Server and Client Originally from [b]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=452322.0[/b][/center]
Let me start off with the obvious. First, this server is nowhere near being perfect. Second, this server is not here to make me or anyone else money. And third, with enough help, this server could be incredible. At the moment, we have a web site (the URL is above) with a section about how you can download our client and cache. Please click on the "Downloads" section on the top of the website and follow the directions to acquire your version of The Inglorious Fate. But first, let me explain to you what this server is all about.
The Inglorious Fate is a RuneScape private server project based upon some of the basic concepts of RuneScape while also introducing new themes in order to create a familiar yet original environment. Yes, the server is quite empty at the moment, but it also has one advantage: it uses 614 cache, which is one of the newest revisions to date. And what's the ultimate goal, you might ask? It's too far-fetched to even think about right now, but the goal is quite simple: to completely reinvent the RuneScape world as we all know it. Sure, this accomplishment is months away from full completion; but if it were to be completed, the world of private servers would be forever changed. So, lo and behold, here is The Inglorious Fate!
[center][b]If you want to apply for a position (listed below), please either visit the following website to apply (http://ingloriousfate.99k.org/development/apply.html) -OR- fill out the appropriate form below and post the answers on this thread:[/b][/center]
[center][b]NOTE: If you applied to this server on the other Development Team thread, please re-apply! I have a lot more time now, so hopefully, this project will work.[/b][/center]
[hr]
[center][b]Positions Open:[/b]
Server Coders: 2 / 4 (OPEN) --Owner Nick (Project Realm) --Liquid Magic
[code] In which time zone do you live (example: EST)? How much time everyday (on average) can you dedicate to Server Programming? Can you program in Java? Which Integrated Development Environment (IDE) do you have, and are you able to use it extensively? Are you able to work with others well? Would you call yourself a creative person? Have you ever programmed in a previous RuneScape private server project before? If so, please explain. Any extra information. [/code]
Advertisers: 1 / 2 (OPEN) --mursanari
[code] In which time zone do you live (example: EST)? How much time everyday (on average) can you dedicate to Advertising? Are you able to work with others well? Would you call yourself a creative person? Have you ever advertised for a RuneScape private server, or other project, before? If so, please explain. Any extra information. [/code]
Graphic Artist: 2 / 3 (OPEN) --Owner Nick (Project Realm) --gara494
[code] In which time zone do you live (example: EST)? How much time everyday (on average) are you available to produce graphics? Which graphics program do you have, and are you able to use it extensively? Are you able to work with others well? Would you call yourself a creative person? Have you ever produced computer graphics for ANY purpose before? If so, if any are available, can you please show them to me. Any extra information. [/code]
Other: [b]PLEASE SPECIFY IN APPLICATION[/b] [b]Note: I am NOT looking for in-game mods or admins. All of these slots will be taken up by development team members, so don't bother applying for them.[/b][/center]
[hr]
[center][b]Current Server Information:[/b]
[ul][li]100% Player on Player Melee Combat ([b]CONTINUOUS![/b])[/li] [li]90% Construction[/li] [li][b]Several[/b] commands (posted on site), with many more almost implemented[/li] [li]90% Player on Player Ranged Combat (Just need to fix a few bugs)[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center][b]Current Server Goals:[/b]
[ul][li][i]Fully implement and fix combat (melee, ranged and mage)[/li] [li][i]Create high score system[/li] [li][i]Fix Construction and Player Owned Houses[/li] [li][i]Implement Grand Exchange[/li] [li][i]Add PKing to designated areas[/li] [li][i]Add Stock System[/li] [li][i]Fix any Bugs (there may be many)[/li][/ul] [/center]
Thank you for your interest in The Inglorious Fate, and if you have chosen to be a part of this incredible project, be ready for one of the best private servers in existence!
[center]Sincerely, Owner Nick (Project Realm) Owner of The Inglorious Fate[/center]

item.title: The Inglorious Fate [614] - Recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @AS75150 AS75150
item.description:
@AS75150 wrote:

[size=12pt][size=14pt][b]In which time zone do you live (example: EST)?
Eastern
How much time everyday (on average) can you dedicate to Server Programming?
5 or 6 hours
Can you program in Java?
a little
Which Integrated Development Environment (IDE) do you have, and are you able to use it extensively?
jre and jdk
Are you able to work with others well?
yes as long as they respect me i can do the same to others
Would you call yourself a creative person?
I have my own world i like to go to, to release stress and i get alot of ideas from that world.
Have you ever programmed in a previous RuneScape private server project before? If so, please explain.
yes i have if u look up my youtube channel it has previous videos of my servers i created and the servers i helped mod ingame
Any extra information.

i am a strict mod but only when things start.
heres a list of my punishment order.
jail
temp mute
perm mute
temp ban
perminate ban

but its 3 jails for temp mute
and same thing with all of them 3 strikes to the next punishment so its a simple solution to stop things and giving a good warning

i love to help players because it makes me feel better on the inside because i know i can help some other people online then for the people i know.

i love to see others happiness so thats about it
xxbandosxx@yahoo.com
[/b][/size][/size]

Read full topic

item.title: The Inglorious Fate [614] - Recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

[quote=“mursanari, post:13, topic:379625”]In which time zone do you live (example: EST)?: Est
How much time everyday (on average) can you dedicate to Advertising?; about 2 - 4 hours a day
Are you able to work with others well? Yes
Would you call yourself a creative person? Yes i would and not to mention everyone else that knows me
Have you ever advertised for a RuneScape private server, or other project, before? If so, please explain. Ive advertised for many server most of them you wont know of (about 13), i advertised on chat rooms, friends list and much more.
Any extra information; i am really dedicated to private servers and i have lots of experience because i have owned servers, and moderated and administrated quite a few of the servers that i have played, I’m a likeable person and very commited and you can expect to see me online quite often.[/quote]

Accepted, welcome aboard as well :). I’m going to need your email if you have one, or if you would prefer to use this PM system, that’s cool as well. An email is a big help for me, though.

Read full topic

item.title: The Inglorious Fate [614] - Recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

Wow, lots to respond to! Always a good sign.

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:6, topic:379625”]I would like to apply (for something to do)

In which time zone do you live (example: EST)?
Central, USA

How much time everyday (on average) can you dedicate to Server Programming?
I no-life on weekdays, and you can expect me on at late times on the weekends, because I need to go places too…

Can you program in Java?
[humor]No, I am applying so I can bitch and moan about how everyone is doing it wrong.[/humor]

Yes.

Which Integrated Development Environment (IDE) do you have, and are you able to use it extensively?
When I’m fucking around with Java, I use Eclipse, unless I’m doing something random and stupid using a visual approach, then I use Netbeans.

Are you able to work with others well?
I’m going to be honest: No, no I cannot. This is because a lot of people have ideas, personalities, and goals, which differ compared to mine. But I can tough it out.

Would you call yourself a creative person?
Yes! You should see some of the fucked up shit I do with a graphics API.

Have you ever programmed in a previous RuneScape private server project before? If so, please explain.
Sorry, but this question confuses me. I always use Hyperion for my projects.

Any extra information.
I do some web development for you too…

P.S - Activision publishes games o.o http://ingloriousfate.99k.org/development/devteam.html[/quote]
Accepted, welcome aboard Also, I’m going to need your email… I forgot to ask that on the application. If you’d rather just use this PM system, I’m cool with that. An email would help though. And yeah, Activision published Call of Duty: Black Ops. :eek:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:7, topic:379625”]Stability is awful, the base is terrible also.
I suggest you start development on your own :).[/quote]
I agree with you about the instability of the server, but having a few programmers to help me make it perfect isn’t too much to ask for, is it?

[quote=“Uncalled, post:9, topic:379625”]I actually do adore how well setup your site is.

Good luck with this.[/quote]
Thank you! Took me some time to figure it all out, but I guess it came out alright.

Read full topic

item.title: The Inglorious Fate [614] - Recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Your going to get in a lot of trouble, no doubt. Good luck with the development though, I didn’t seem to find a forum so I’m guessing the website isn’t done.

I’m just using their site format as a temporary solution… I’m actively trying to find a better one, but as long as the server doesn’t get too popular (which it won’t), I won’t get caught. Fingers crossed.

And yeah the site isn’t anywhere near done. Forums will take some time, as will a high score system, but I’m up for a challenge.

item.title: The Inglorious Fate [614] - Recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][size=14pt]Welcome to the Development Team Recruitment page for The Inglorious Fate![/size]
[br]
[center][/center]

~Info~
Game Name: The Inglorious Fate
Web Site: http://ingloriousfate.99k.org/
Cache Revision: 614
Server and Client Originally from http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=452322.0[/center]

Let me start off with the obvious. First, this server is nowhere near being perfect. Second, this server is not here to make me or anyone else money. And third, with enough help, this server could be incredible. At the moment, we have a web site (the URL is above) with a section about how you can download our client and cache. Please click on the “Downloads” section on the top of the website and follow the directions to acquire your version of The Inglorious Fate. But first, let me explain to you what this server is all about.

The Inglorious Fate is a RuneScape private server project based upon some of the basic concepts of RuneScape while also introducing new themes in order to create a familiar yet original environment. Yes, the server is quite empty at the moment, but it also has one advantage: it uses 614 cache, which is one of the newest revisions to date. And what’s the ultimate goal, you might ask? It’s too far-fetched to even think about right now, but the goal is quite simple: to completely reinvent the RuneScape world as we all know it. Sure, this accomplishment is months away from full completion; but if it were to be completed, the world of private servers would be forever changed. So, lo and behold, here is The Inglorious Fate!

[center]If you want to apply for a position (listed below), please either visit the following website to apply (http://ingloriousfate.99k.org/development/apply.html)
-OR-
fill out the appropriate form below and post the answers on this thread:[/center]

[center]NOTE: If you applied to this server on the other Development Team thread, please re-apply! I have a lot more time now, so hopefully, this project will work.[/center]

[hr]

[center]Positions Open:

Server Coders: 2 / 4 (OPEN)
–Owner Nick (Project Realm)
–Liquid Magic

In which time zone do you live (example: EST)?
How much time everyday (on average) can you dedicate to Server Programming?
Can you program in Java?
Which Integrated Development Environment (IDE) do you have, and are you able to use it extensively?
Are you able to work with others well?
Would you call yourself a creative person?
Have you ever programmed in a previous RuneScape private server project before? If so, please explain.
Any extra information.

Advertisers: 1 / 2 (OPEN)
–mursanari

In which time zone do you live (example: EST)?
How much time everyday (on average) can you dedicate to Advertising?
Are you able to work with others well?
Would you call yourself a creative person?
Have you ever advertised for a RuneScape private server, or other project, before? If so, please explain.
Any extra information.

Graphic Artist: 2 / 3 (OPEN)
–Owner Nick (Project Realm)
–gara494

In which time zone do you live (example: EST)?
How much time everyday (on average) are you available to produce graphics?
Which graphics program do you have, and are you able to use it extensively?
Are you able to work with others well?
Would you call yourself a creative person?
Have you ever produced computer graphics for ANY purpose before? If so, if any are available, can you please show them to me.
Any extra information.

Other: PLEASE SPECIFY IN APPLICATION
Note: I am NOT looking for in-game mods or admins. All of these slots will be taken up by development team members, so don’t bother applying for them.[/center]

[hr]

[center]Current Server Information:

[ul][li]100% Player on Player Melee Combat (CONTINUOUS!)[/li]
[li]90% Construction[/li]
[li]Several commands (posted on site), with many more almost implemented[/li]
[li]90% Player on Player Ranged Combat (Just need to fix a few bugs)[/li][/ul]
[/center]

[center]Current Server Goals:

[ul][li][i]Fully implement and fix combat (melee, ranged and mage)[/li]
[li][i]Create high score system[/li]
[li][i]Fix Construction and Player Owned Houses[/li]
[li][i]Implement Grand Exchange[/li]
[li][i]Add PKing to designated areas[/li]
[li][i]Add Stock System[/li]
[li][i]Fix any Bugs (there may be many)[/li][/ul]
[/center]

Thank you for your interest in The Inglorious Fate, and if you have chosen to be a part of this incredible project, be ready for one of the best private servers in existence!

[center]Sincerely,
Owner Nick (Project Realm)
Owner of The Inglorious Fate[/center]

Read full topic
